title: Teradata - Overview
description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Teradata environment for monitoring database and table disk space, system resource usage, and AMP resource usage to spot potential issues.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Teradata environment for monitoring database and table disk space, system resource usage, and AMP resource usage to spot potential issues.

Further reading on Teradata Monitoring:

* [Datadog's Teradata Integration Docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/teradata)

definition.title: Total space limit skew % (perm vs spool vs temp)
Total max profile space (temp vs spool)

definition.content: Use the `teradata.disk_space.[*].total` metrics to monitor total space in each database.

To monitor total space in each database **by table**, use the  the table-specific `teradata.disk_space.*` metrics.

Enable the `collect_table_disk_metrics` option in the [`teradata.d/conf.yaml`](https://github.com/DataDog/integrations-core/blob/master/teradata/datadog_checks/teradata/data/conf.yaml.example) configuration file to populate this dashboard with Table Disk metrics.

definition.title: Space limit skew % (perm vs spool vs temp)
Max profile temp space (temp vs spool)
